pages.text: $(li)Syrup Bottles are a new kind of food that can be make Smelting a $(l:patchouli:tools/autumnity/sap_bottle)Sap Bottle$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfire$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can use this item to craft a Pattern, Pancake, or Pumpkin Bread in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).
